locationChallenges.title: Day of The Week
locationChallenges.description: Do you know what day of the week this is?

locationChallenges.title: How many numbers
locationChallenges.description: We need to know how many numbers there are before 10, can you count them?

locationChallenges.title: How many numbers
locationChallenges.description: We need to know how many numbers there are before 30, can you count them?

locationChallenges.title: Biscuits, biscuits, biscuits!
locationChallenges.description: There may be a lot of different types of biscuits, but which ones are the best? There's only one right answer!

locationChallenges.title: Do you know your STEM
locationChallenges.description: Do you know what this letter in STEM stands for?
